selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer as a single line output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the integer answer representing the total volume of the measuring cup.

new_skill_specs.name: extract_largest_marking_from_image
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract the largest numeric marking from the image of the measuring cup to determine its total volume.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The largest numeric marking as an integer.
edge_cases: Image is blurry or markings are not clear.
